sentences.sContent: The maenad on the right is playing a tambourine.
sentences.sContent_eng: The maenad on the right is playing a tambourine.
sentences.sCn: 神像右边的女祭司正演奏著小手鼓。

trans.tranOther: a circular musical instrument consisting of a frame covered with skin or plastic and small pieces of metal that hang around the edge. You shake it or hit it with your hand.
